fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: all the initiatives (legislatives and political) aiming to defining standard policy in the area of lift.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The corporate purpose includes representation, development and protection of its members’ common interests as European lifts, goods lifts components manufacturers, within the European Union. All activities with this regard will be undertaken. 
 
The corporate purpose includes the participation, with simple decision of the Management Board, into any public or private bodies having concern with the lifts sector; moreover, the corporate purpose includes the collaboration concerning security and quality of components and any type of activity that the Grouping’s statutory bodies consider as useful components for institutional purposes. Further more, the Grouping is intended to raise the awareness of the social useful function of lifts for people and materials.
